attributes.action: accept Jamie Oliver's "Minstry of Food" Manifesto 17/10/2008 and agree to implement  the Manifesto
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Jamie Oliver has done some brilliant work to get "non-cooks" able to cook, both at home, school, and in the work-place, and we feel that this needs to be accepted and funded by the British Government
